title: Performance Analysis of Automated Testing Tools: JMeter and TestComplete
abstract: Presently, we perceive swift progression in web services which acts as communication interface for various web applications. Several automation testing tools help the testers to execute testing on web services or applications. The objective of this paper is to systematically analyze the features, architectures and usage automation testing tools. The functioning of two automation tools such as Apache JMeter and TestComplete has evaluated to test web services and web pages in context to factors i.e. load performance, response time etc. with respect to the number of users or threads. This paper has provided the insight of tool analysis and scenarios where it would be beneficial. It has also described the various results in the format of tables and graphs for easy understanding and uses of these tools.
venue: 2018 International Conference on Advances in Computing, Communication Control and Networking (ICACCCN)

journal.name: 2018 International Conference on Advances in Computing, Communication Control and Networking (ICACCCN)
